Fresnel-Kirchhoff

Ep=−ik2πEse−iωt∬ObstacleF(θ)eik(r+r′)rr′ dAE_p = \frac{-ik}{2\pi}E_s e^{-i\omega t} \iint_{Obstacle} F(\theta)\frac{e^{ik(r+r')}}{rr'} \,dAEp​=2π−ik​Es​e−iωt∬Obstacle​F(θ)rr′eik(r+r′)​dA

Skewness Factor

F(θ)=1+cos⁡θ2F(\theta) = \frac{1+\cos\theta}{2}F(θ)=21+cosθ​

Raius of Fresnel Zones

Rn≈nLλ        where        1L=1p+1qR_n \approx \sqrt{nL\lambda} \,\,\,\,\,\,\,\ \textup{where} \,\,\,\,\,\,\,\ \frac{1}{L}=\frac{1}{p}+\frac{1}{q}Rn​≈nLλ​ where L1​=p1​+q1​
